findings.rationale: Assignment language may transfer ownership of work product or IP rather than granting a limited license.

findings.title: IP ownership via work product language
findings.rationale: Work product ownership language can effectively transfer IP even if assignment wording is indirect.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY All work product and deliverables shall be owned by Client. Provider hereby assigns all rights, title, and interest in the work product to Client....

1. SERVICES
Provider agrees to provide the services described in attached Statements of Work.

Payment is due within 30 days of invoice date.

findings.title: Short termination or notice windows
findings.rationale: Short or strict notice windows can lead to accidental renewals or unintended termination.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...6. TERM AND TERMINATION Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice....

claims, losses, and expenses without limitation.

5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
In no event shall Provider's liability exceed the total fees paid under this Agreement.

6. TERM AND TERMINATION
Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.

7. CONFIDENTIALITY
